medium: Wool; woven fabric, embroidery, knotting, twining?
title: Saddle bag
description:
Saddle bag; Hehbelik. Wool. Embroidered areas at top are decorated with squares, crosses, and triangles of red, green, brown, blue and white wool. Herringbone borders at top of black, brown, and white goat hair. 
Woven fabric and embroidery.
creditline: The Katherine Kittredge McMillan Memorial Fund
